subject: CodeRabbit code review
description:
**Type:** Task

Run CodeRabbit AI code review on the fibonacci changes using `coderabbit` agent.

**Verification:** Review findings documented

learnings: fibonacci(78) = 8944394323791464 is the largest Fibonacci number within Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER
Array spread in reduce is O(n^2) but acceptable when n is small and immutability is prioritized
Number.isInteger() returns false for NaN and Infinity, so a single guard covers multiple edge cases
